### dplyr Verbs:

| Verb | Action |
|------|--------|
| select() | Choose columns |
| filter() | Choose rows |
| mutate() | Create columns |
| summarize() | Aggregate |
| group_by() | Group data |

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data, aes(x = age, y = income)) +
  geom_point() +
  ggtitle("Age vs Income")

# Without pipe
result <- filter(select(df, name, age), age > 25)

# With pipe (%>%)
result <- df %>%
  select(name, age) %>%
  filter(age > 25)

# Two-sample t-test
result <- t.test(group1, group2)

print(result$p.value)
print(result$conf.int)
